ThingDef.label: bionic hand
ThingDef.description: An advanced artificial hand. Silenced mini-servos give great strength, while the biogel nerve-link gives exquisite control. A lattice-dust healing system allows it to recover from damage. It is better than a biological hand in almost every way.

ThingDef.label: painshunt
ThingDef.description: An advanced brain implant. It has greatly reduces the pain felt by the user. It is popular among underworld gladiators and fighting rings in urbworlds.

ThingDef.label: sleepshunt
ThingDef.description: An advanced brain implant. It has greatly reduces the tiredness experienced by the user, allowing them to be more productive each day. It is popular among university students in urbworlds and glitterworlds.

ThingDef.label: megashunt
ThingDef.description: An advanced brain implant. This combines the effects of the painshunt and sleepshunt. The user will experience less pain and require less sleep per day.

ThingDef.label: bionic energy cell
ThingDef.description: An implantable bionic energy cell. High-density compressed carbon filaments and organic superlubricants make this possible. It is rated as a medium output, medium capacity device in this class. It is well-rounded and will meet the needs of most bionic users.

ThingDef.label: bionic supercapacitor
ThingDef.description: An implantable bionic supercapacitor. High-density compressed carbon filaments and thin orgocomposite films make this possible. It is rated as a high output, low capacity device in this class. Use case is for those who require lots of power but don't venture far from a charging point.
